city_optional_in_query.name: city
city_optional_in_query.description: city to property search within. Eg - Manali

exclude_city_optional_in_query.description: city to exclude, only supports one city

exclude_area_optional_in_query.name: exclude_area
exclude_area_optional_in_query.description: area to exclude, only supports one area

roomtype_optional_in_query.name: roomtype
roomtype_optional_in_query.description: roomtype ids to put filter in. (comma separated ids)

cancellation_policy_optional_in_query.name: cancellation_policy
cancellation_policy_optional_in_query.description: cancellation policy ids to put filter in (comma separated ids)

property_type_optional_in_query.description: property type ids to put filter in (comma separated ids)

amenities_optional_in_query.description: amenity ids to put filter in (comma separated ids)

cash_on_arrival_optional_in_query.name: cash_on_arrival
cash_on_arrival_optional_in_query.description: properties with cash_on_arrival. (0 - does not put any filter)

have_images_optional_in_query.description: search properties which have images (0 - all properties)

within_distance_optional_in_query.name: within_distance
within_distance_optional_in_query.description: list properties within distance (in miles). (0 - does not put distance filter)

prive_optional_in_query.name: prive
prive_optional_in_query.description: properties with prive flag (0 - does not put any filter)

extra_params_optional_in_query.name: extra_params
extra_params_optional_in_query.description: Extra parameters. Currently we are collecting 'prive' and 'is_promotional' keys only. Eg: abc=10%26d=20.

collections_offset_optional_in_query.name: collections_offset
collections_offset_optional_in_query.description: Number of collection. This is for pagination purpose.

collections_property_total_optional_in_q.description: Total Number of property in collections.

collections_total_optional_in_query.description: Total Number of collections. This is for pagination purpose.

is_promotional_optional_in_query.name: is_promotional

sort_for_bookings.description: Sorting order Eg. 1 For checkin date , 2 For checkout, 3 For booking amount

travelled_places_optional_in_form.description: places travelled to by user (multiple places to be passed as comma seperated string i.e. {Goa, Mumbai})

spoken_languages_optional_in_form.name: spoken_languages
spoken_languages_optional_in_form.description: languages spoken by user (multiple languages to be passed as comma seperated string i.e. {English, Hindi})

archived_optional_in_query.description: to fetch archived requests set archived = 1 else archived = 0

reply_in_form.name: reply
reply_in_form.description: reply string for review by host

coupon_code_in_form.description: coupon code to be applied for booking
